utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Coffee.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Cappuccino.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Grazie.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And a nice hot cider for Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Aww, thank you. Uh Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why does my cinamon stick have an eraser?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! That's why. I'm sorry!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Mrs. Tedlock. You're looking lovely today. And may I say, that is a very flattering sleeve length on you.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Tedlock
utterance.content: Yes. Well, Mr. Kostelick wants you to stop by his office at the end of the day.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, listen. If this is about those prank memos, I had nothing to do with them. Really. Nothing at all. Really. Nothing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey you guys! Chandler's coming and he says he has, like, this incredible news, so when he gets here, we could all act like, you know...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Never mind. But it was going to be really good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: What is it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, it's a typical day at work. I'm inputting my numbers, and big Al calls me into his office and tells me he wants to make me processing supervisor.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: That's great!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So.... I quit.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why? This was supposed to be a temp job!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, Chandler... you've been there for five years.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If I took this promotion, it'd be like admitting that this is what I actually do.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So was it a lot more money?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It doesn't matter. I just don't want to be one of those guys that's in his office until twelve o'clock at night worrying about the WENUS.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ... the WENUS?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Weekly Estimated Net Usage Systems. A processing term.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. That WENUS.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So what're you going to do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know. That's the thing. I don't know what I want to do. I just know I'm not going to figure it out working there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oooh! I have something you can do! I have this new massage client... Steve? Anyway, he's opening up a restaurant and he's looking for a head chef.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Um... hi there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi! Oh, yeah, no, I know. You're a chef. I know, and I thought of you first, but um, Chandler's the one who needs a job right now, so....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah... I just don't have that much cheffing experience. Unless it's an all-toast restaurant.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, what kind of food is he looking for?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, he wants to do some ecclectic, so he's looking for someone who can, you know, create the entire menu.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I know! So, what do you think?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks, Phoebe. But I just don't really see myself in a big white hat.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: OK. Oh Monica! Guess what!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can you see my nipples through this shirt?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. But don't worry, I'm sure they're still there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Where are you going, Mr. Suity-Man?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I have an appointment to see Dr. Robert Pillman, career counselor a-gogo. I added the "a-gogo."

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Career counselor?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, you guys all know what you want to do.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, you guys in the living room all know what you want to do. You know, you have goals. You have dreams. I don't have a dream.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah, the lesser-known "I don't have a dream" speech.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I love my life, I love my life!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh! Brian's Song!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: The meeting with the guy went great?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So great! He showed me where the restaurant's going to be. It's this, it's this cute little place on 10th Street. Not too big, not too small. Just right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Was it formerly owned by a blonde woman and some bears?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So anyway, I'm cooking dinner for him Monday night. You know, kind of like an audition. And Phoebe, he really wants you to be here, which will be great for me because then you can 'ooh' and 'ahh' and make yummy noises.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you going to make?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yummy noises.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And Monica, what are you going to make?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't know. I don't know. It's just going to be so great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh! I know what you could make! I know! Oh, you should definitely make that thing... you know, with the stuff? You know, that thing... with the stuff...? OK, I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey guys, does anybody know a good date place in the neighborhood?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How about Tony's? If you can finish a 32-ounce steak, it's free.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK, ahem, hey, does anybody know a good place if you're not dating a puma?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who are you going out with?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, is this the bug lady?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Bzzzz.... I love you, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Her name is Celia. She's not a bug lady. She's curator of insects at the museum.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So what are you guys going to do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I just thought we could go out to dinner, and then maybe bring her back to my place and I'd introduce her to my monkey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And he's not speaking metaphorically.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So.... back to your place...you thinking, maybe... huh-huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I don't know.... huh-huh.... but I'm hoping huh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm telling you, that monkey is a chick magnet! She's going to take one look at his furry, cute little face and it'll seal the deal.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Celia, don't worry! Don't scream! He's not going to hurt you! Soothing tones, Celia. Soothing tones! Marcel...

utterance.speaker: Celia
utterance.content: I can't stand this! He's got his claws in my...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Alright...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: OK, try this salmon mousse.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Mmmm. Good.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is it better than the other salmon mousse?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's creamier.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, well, is that better?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know. We're talking about whipped fish, Monica. I'm just happy I'm keeping it down, y'know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: My God! What happened to you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Eight and a half hours of aptitude tests, intelligence tests, personality tests... and what do I learn? "You are ideally suited for a career in data processing for a large multinational corporation."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's so great! 'Cause you already know how to do that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can you believe it? I mean, don't I seem like somebody who should be doing something really cool? You know, I just always pictured myself doing something...something.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Chandler, I know, I know... oh, hey! You can see your nipples through this shirt!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here you go, maybe this'll cheer you up.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh, you know, I had a grape about five hours ago, so I'd better split this with you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's supposed to be that small. It's a pre-appetizer. The French call it an amouz-bouche.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well.... it is amouz-ing...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello? Oh, hi Wendy! Yeah, eight o'clock. What did we say? Ten dollars an hour?... OK, great. All right, I'll see you then. Bye.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ten dollars an hour for what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I asked one of the waitresses at work if she'd help me out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Waitressing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well... of course I thought of you! But... but...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But, but?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But, you see, it's just... this night has to go just perfect, you know? And, well, Wendy's more of a... professional waitress.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! I see. And I've sort of been maintaining my amateur status so that I can waitress in the Olympics.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know, I don't mean to brag, but I waited tables at Innsbruck in '76. Amouz-bouche?

utterance.speaker: Celia
utterance.content: Talk to me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK.... um, a weird thing happened to me on the train this morning...

utterance.speaker: Celia
utterance.content: No no no. Talk... dirty.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wha... what, here?

utterance.speaker: Celia
utterance.content: Yes...

utterance.speaker: Celia
utterance.content: Say something..... hot.

utterance.speaker: Celia
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Um... uh.... vulva.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Vulva?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Alright, I panicked, alright? She took me by surprise. You know, but it wasn't a total loss. I mean, we ended up cuddling.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoaa!! You cuddled? How many times??

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Shut up! It was nice. I just... I don't think I'm the dirty-talking kind of guy, you know?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's the big deal? You just say what you want to do to her. Or what you want her to do to you. Or what you think other people might be doing to each other. I'll tell you what. Just try something on me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Please be kidding.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why not? Come on! Just, just close your eyes and tell me what you'd like to be doing right now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK. I'm in my apartment...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: ....yeah... what else?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's it. I'm in my apartment, you're not there, we're not having this conversation.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, look, I'll start, OK?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, please.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on. Come on. Alright, ready, look! Oh... Ross.... you get me so hot. I want your lips on me now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, now you say something.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I... ahem... I really don't think so.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on! You like this woman, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You want to see her again, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well if you can't talk dirty to me, how're you going to talk dirty to her? Now tell me you want to caress my butt!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK, turn around. I just don't want you staring at me when I'm doing this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, alright. I'm around. Go ahead.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ahem... I want.... OK, I want to... feel your... hot, soft skin with my lips.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There you go! Keep going. Keep going!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I, er...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I want to take my tongue... and...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Say it... say it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ...run it all over your body until you're... trembling with... with...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ....with??

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Funny story!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're not going to believe this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's OK. It's OK. I was always rooting for you two kids to get together.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Chandler, while you were sleeping that guy from your old job called again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Again?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And again, and again, and again... Hello? And again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Mr. Kostelic! How's life on the fifteenth floor? Yeah, I miss you too. Yeah, it's a lot less satisfying to steal pens from your own home, you know? Well, that's very generous er, but look, this isn't about the money. I need something that's more than a job. I need something I can really care about.... And that's on top of the yearly bonus structure you mentioned earlier? Look, Al, Al... I'm not playing hardball here, OK? This is not a negotiation, this is a rejection! No! No! No, stop saying numbers! I'm telling you, you've got the wrong guy! You've got the wrong guy! I'll see you on Monday!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! It's huge! It's so much bigger than the cubicle. Oh, this is a cube.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look at this!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! You have a window!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes indeedy! With a beautiful view of...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh look! That guy's peeing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: OK, that's enough of the view. Check this out, look at this. Sit down, sit down.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: OK.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is great! Helen, could you come in here for a moment?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you Helen, that'll be all.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Last time I do that, I promise.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wendy, we had a deal! Yeah, you promised! Wendy! Wendy! Wendy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who was that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wendy bailed. I have no waitress.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... that's too bad. Bye bye.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ten dollars an hour.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Twelve dollars an hour.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Mon. I wish I could, but I've made plans to walk around.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know, Rachel, when you ran out of your wedding, I was there for you. I put a roof over your head, and if that means nothing to you... twenty dollars an hour.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Done.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well hello! Welcome to Monica's. May I take your coat?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi Steve!

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Hello, Monica. Hello, greeter girl.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Yeah, OK.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mmmmmm! Everything smells so delicious! You know, I can't remember a time I smelt such a delicious combination of of, OK, smells.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: It's a lovely apartment.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, thank you. Would you like a tour?

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: I was just being polite, but, alright.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: In the cab, on the way over, Steve blazed up a doobie.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Smoked a joint? You know, lit a bone? Weed? Hemp? Ganja?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OK, OK. I'm with you, Cheech. OK.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Is it dry in here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Let me, let me get you some wine!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I think we're ready for our first course. OK, um, these are rot-shrimp ravioli, and celantro pondou sauce... ... with just a touch of mints... and... ... ginger.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Well, smack my ass and call me Judy! These are fantastic!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm so glad you liked them!

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Like 'em? I could eat a hundred of them!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, well... um, that's all there are of these. But in about eight and a half minutes, we'll be serving some delicious onion tartlets.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Tartlets. Tartlets. Tartlets. The word has lost all meaning.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me? Can I help you with anything?

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: You know, I don't know what I'm looking for.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Ah, cool! Taco shells! You know, these are... they're like a little corn envelope.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know that? You don't want to spoil your appetite.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Hey! Sugar-O's!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know, if you just wait another... six and a half minutes...

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Macaroni and cheese! We gotta make this!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, we don't.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Oh, OK. Oh, sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don't you just have a seat here? OK... give me the Gummi-bears.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Give them to me.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Alright, we'll share.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, give me the...

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Well then you can't have any. Bear overboard! I think he's drowning. Hey fellows! Grab on a Sugar-O... save yourself! "Help! I'm drowning! Help!"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's it! Dinner is over!

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why? It's just that I've waited seven years for an opportunity like this, and you can't even wait four and a half minutes for a stupid onion tartlet?

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What a tool!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You don't want to work for a guy like that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know... it's just... I thought this was, you know... it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, you'll get there. You're an amazing chef.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! You know all those yummy noises? I wasn't faking.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, er... how did it go with Celia?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I was unbelievable.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was the James Michener of dirty talk. It was the most elaborate filth you have ever heard. I mean, there were characters, plot lines, themes, a motif... at one point there were villagers.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! And the... huh-huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, ahem... you know, by the time we'd finished with all the dirty talk, it was kinda late... and we were both kind of exhausted, so uh...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You cuddled.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, which was nice.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys wanna try and catch a late movie or something?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Maybe, but shouldn't we wait for Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, where the hell is he?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, Fran. I know what time it is, but I'm looking at the WENUS and I'm not happy!... Oh, really, really, really? Well, let me tell you something... you will care about it, because I care about it! You got it? Good! Whooooaaaa....

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How's this?

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Eeeee!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sorry. How about over here?

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Aaaaah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: See, that just means it's working. Does this hurt?

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What about this?

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Aaaaahhh!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There you go!
